text: ğŸš¨ Energy alert! ğŸš¨"An energy war is being waged": former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks ğŸ’¥The destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure by Russia will lead to a dramatic rise in European energy prices, warns Andriy Kobolyev, former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company. ğŸ’°If European energy markets believe the Russians are winning this war, it will have a devastating impact on energy prices. ğŸ˜±Ukraine needs more weapons to protect its energy infrastructure, or there won't be an economy left to reconstruct. ğŸ’ªThe recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west caused a significant spike in European gas prices, as these facilities are still operational and used by European gas traders. ğŸ“ˆThe damage inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. ğŸ˜¨Will Europe take action to prevent this energy crisis? ğŸ¤”#EnergyWar
